effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.
